data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Edward O'Brien, Jr. | November 11, 2022 | O'Leary Funeral Home Ltd
data.text:
Edward J. O'Brien, Jr., 88, of Glenolden, PA passed away peacefully on November 11, 2022.

Ed was born on November 18, 1933. Ed was the son of the late Edward J. and Ada (Barefoot) O'Brien, Sr. of Philadelphia, PA. He graduated from Saint Thomas More Catholic Boys Highschool and Drexel University.

He was a member of Saint Joe’s Parish and Our Lady of Fátima. He enjoyed playing basketball, telling war stories, watching sports, card night, going to the casino, playing instant lottery, going to church, Sunday’s at the diner, and most importantly spending time with his family.

Beloved husband of the Late Eleanor (Little) and Margaret (Ancone); Loving Father of Edward, Kathleen (Greg) Pecko, Karen (Louis) Borrelli, Michael (Diane) and James (Mark) O'Brien; Cherished Grandfather of 11 Grandchildren Gregory, (Kaleigh), Erica, Lauren, Marc, Dana, Louis, Jenna, Nicole, Jessica, Ethan and Katie, and 2 great grandchildren Hunter and Ainsley. He is also survived by many nephews, nieces, cousins, and more.

Relatives and friends are invited to his Viewing Thursday, Nov. 17, 2022, 9:30am St. Joseph Church 500 Woodlawn Ave. Collingdale, PA 19023, and to his Funeral Mass 10:30am in the Church. Int. SS. Peter & Paul Cemetery. Contributions to the Tunnels to Towers Foundation. Address: 2361 Hylan Blvd, Staten Island, NY 10306 Website: https://t2t.org/
